about.title: AURORA HOTEL
about.subtitle: Taps into clients's emotions
about.description1: Located in the heart of the dynamic city, right on the romantic beach, Aurora Hotel expresses a desire to bring excellent full-service to all customers. In addition, visitors will get a chance to enjoy delicious food as well as high quality specialities selected from the essence of Ho Chi Minh City's unique culinary culture right at Annata's restaurant.
about.description2: With modern amenities and professional service, we ensure every moment of your stay will be memorable and comfortable.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Experience luxury and comfort with our premium services

luxuryRooms.title: Luxury Rooms
luxuryRooms.description: Spacious and elegantly designed rooms with ocean views

fineDining.title: Fine Dining
fineDining.description: Exquisite cuisine prepared by world-class chefs

wellness.title: Wellness & Spa
wellness.description: Relax and rejuvenate with our premium spa services
